name: Skyrider Greatsword

refinement_effect.refine_one: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.
refinement_effect.refine_two: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 7% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.
refinement_effect.refine_three: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 8% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.
refinement_effect.refine_four: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 9% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.
refinement_effect.refine_five: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 10% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.

description: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying swordâ€¦ for the second time.
